subject: Re: Someone sent this to me---From Bruce's Yahoo group---HE'S A...
author: Misty
full_text:
LOL well I think you are wrong about that Frank there are quite a few people in this group that are in other groups with him or listen to him and have no clue who he really is until they see it. And quite a few who have seen it as it happened as well as those who just like to keep tabs on the research going on by others.

Misty

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "purplespacefriend" <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Now I feel bad for posting that, I did n't want to start anything, It's just for the the very few that might take this guy at his word. There's probably none of those on this group. 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@ wrote:
> >
> > Not my message to Frank was not that, it was about spirit that wanted to  
> > talk to him,  who are you LK?  You are jumping the gun a bit are you  not?  
> > As I explained already, my note to Frank although it is not anyone's  
> > business, went like this:
> >  
> >  I'm sure if a comet hit the Earth (God forbid), Bruce would save your  
> > life or you would save his Frank if need be.  God Bless Us one and  all, sf
> >  
> >  
> >  
> >  
> > In a message dated 7/31/2009 1:57:33 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
> > itcnap@ writes:
> > 
> >  
> >  
> >  
> > WHAT?? YOU SENT HIM THAT HURTFUL MESSAGE?? HOW  CRUEL!!!!
> > 
> > LK
> > 
> > --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  
> > SnowfireL@,  Sn
> > >
> > > I agree, as I sent a private email  to Frank, if one of them were 
> > hurting,
> > > either one of them if a  comet hit this Earth, I am sure either one of
> > them
> > > would reach out  to save each other's life, people say things about
> > each
> > > other when  they get angry without meaning to, it's more of a personal 
> > hurt
> > >  inside the self, it was wrong to send this is silly. The only reason 
> > I  came
> > > back was because I did not have Frank's address, now I do, so If  I get
> > > kicked off this list by anyone, so be it, but the reason I did  come
> > back was
> > > because Spirit were giving me Frank's full name I  thought it might be
> > someone
> > > he knew asking for him. God Bless Us  one and all, sf
> > >
> > >
> > > In a message dated 7/31/2009 1:31:51  P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
> > > itcnap@  writes:
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > Due to the improper slanderous  outburst of this individual, he has
> > been
> > > banned from the IPAA as a  professional, and he has been removed
> > everywhere
> > > that states he is  a professional. He is not!! and Yes Snow, he did
> > mean to
> > > slight,  and this is not the beginning, he slings to much for the
> > paranormal
> > >  research. It is time everyone ignored this individual and move on.  and
> > BTW,
> > > just a note....whom ever sent that letter to FS, hey YOU,  what a sorry
> > mean
> > > ass thing to do and stir up drama and  deliberately hurt someone's
> > > feelings.... feelings....<WBR>Due to the improper  slanderou
> > individual,
> > >
> > > LK
> > >
> > >  --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroup  --- In _EV_EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ 
> > (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ) ,  
> > Frank
> > > Sumption purplealiengirl@ Sumption 
> > >  >
> > > > Just FYI--I'm not like these other clowns, proclaiming how  great I
> > am!
> > > I've
> > > > said over and over I know the older  boxes are just shit, and should
> > be
> > > > thrown away. I also stated  I'm no engineer, and it takes me a long
> > time
> > > to
> > > > figure  this stuff out, and it seems, few if anyone else can get 
> > this
> > >  stuff
> > > > to work at all. I don't sell the stuff, no one is out  money, except
> > for
> > > > postage. I made no claims about how great my  boxes are.
> > > >
> > > > Haliday cuts and pastes words together to  form impressive sounding
> > > > messages, then proclaims how great he  is, and that's all this crap
> > is,
> > > > cutting someone else down for  his own benifit. The guy produces
> > nothing
> > > on
> > > > his own,  and can't even spell radio, let alone make one! How dare
> > you
> > > >  (hiliday) cut me down!? Talk about friggin' slander!
> > > >
> > > >  The world is full is these scumbags all proclaiming how  righteous,
> > how
> > > > conservative, how--whatever, the darkside is  everywhere! But what
> > really
> > > > makes it bad is the morons that  hang on every word from these show
> > > clowns!
> > > > That 's why I  say I can't really take offense, like they say,
> > consider
> > >  the
> > > > source.
> > > >
> > > > So where's my incentive to  continue this work? Think I've spend 
> > enough
> > > > endless night in  the basement!
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >  Frank-S
> > > >
> > > > Forwarded conversation
> > > > Subject:  Someone sent this to me---From Bruce's Yahoo group---HE'S
> > AN
> > >  IDIOT
> > > > !!!!
> > > > ------------ -------- --
> > >  >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > Bonnie,
> > >  >
> > > > The small 20-125 you have is light years ahead of the  Frank's box
> > in the
> > > > quality of communication it allows you to  receive. I have had two
> > Frank's
> > > > boxes #'s 12 and 29. #12 was  stolen from me by a low life that took
> > > > advantage of my  generosity. That is another story.
> > > > I still have Frank's box #29,  the reason you never hear files from
> > me
> > > using
> > > > that box  is because it literally "Sucks!"
> > > >
> > > > Most if not all  Frank's boxes are inherently filled with static
> > white
> > > noise
> > >  > and that combined with a metal echo box and noise generator make  it
> > very
> > > > difficult to hear anything let alone communication  which is
> > difficult
> > > enough
> > > > to hear from a quiet box  like the 125.
> > > >
> > > > Frank's box has seen it's day and  served it's purpose in my opinion
> > it is
> > > > antiquated and is no  where near the quality of even a small cheap
> > RS
> > > 12-469
> > > >  as far as clarity of communication.
> > > >
> > > > Frank is  actually using the guts from RS hacks to build his boxes
> > now so
> > >  why
> > > > have a "FRANKENBOX" that is essentially an RS hack with noise  added
> > > instead
> > > > of just buying an RS box and getting better  communication?
> > > >
> > > > Mind you this is only my opinion but  it is based on years of
> > experience
> > > with
> > > > every box that  is or has been used. I currently have 14 different
> > boxes
> > >  not
> > > > to mention EVP maker and I have done extensive sessions  and
> > research with
> > > > each and for my money you can give me a  20-125 every time, the
> > Frank's
> > > box
> > > > should be retired  to the box museum where it belongs.
> > > >
> > > > I am the only  person in this research that will come out and speak
> > the
> > >  truth
> > > > about the Frank's box, there are many people now that have  them and
> > the
> > > only
> > > > person you will ever hear a file  from is Steve Hultay and sometimes
> > Frank
> > > > himself, and Frank's  files are so rough you may hear 1 out of a
> > hundred
> > > > files the  way he does due to the fact that he does not even take
> > the
> > > time  to
> > > > do a proper session he just turns the box on and records a  couple
> > of
> > > minute
> > > > using his CELL PHONE !
> > >  >
> > > > Frank has his place in RTSC history due to his ALLEGED  invention
> > off the
> > > > first ghost box and he deserves the respect  for his "POSSIBLE"
> > > > accomplishment but to be revered as a god in  the box field NO not
> > by me
> > > > anyway.
> > > >
> > > > I  use the words "ALLEGED" and "POSSIBLE" in terms of his being  the
> > first
> > > to
> > > > create the ghost box due to some recent  information that has been
> > > brought to
> > > > my attention that  concerns an individual that created, built and
> > used A
> > > > Radio  Sweeping Ghost Box in 1969.
> > > >
> > > > I am gathering  information and documentation now and will hopefully
> > be
> > >  able
> > > > to dispel the myth of Frank sumption being the father of the  ghost
> > Box
> > > soon.
> > > >
> > > > That is to be  continued!
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > All is  possible, nothing is probable
> > > >
> > > > Bruce
